version_description: Fixed a bug that displayed your balance incorrectly if you have over 60 minutes.
Now updated with a new interface, voice changers and background noises to help you protect your privacy or just to joke with your closest friends.

Welcome to the completely redesigned SpoofCard app! In this update, you can expect to see more features that'll give you added privacy and protection. We've also made it even easier to sign up, place calls, review recordings, and more. We're extremely excited about this update and hope you love it as much as we do.
Crash fixes for a small group of users
- Fixed some bugs for iOS 10 users
This update fixes a crash some of our users on iOS 10.
- Fixes an issue for users trying to log in with facebook
- Bugfixes
Wi-Fi calling has been added to this most recent version.
Bug fixes
This latest update resolves login issues and issues related to placing calls. Highly recommended update.
This latest update resolves issues related to placing calls and offers a much smoother calling experience. Highly recommended update.
This latest update resolves issues related to placing calls and offers a much smoother calling experience. Highly recommended update.
Minor bug fixes
Bug Fixes.
iPhone X is now fully supported!
Bug fixes

In this newest release, you can expect a number of new updates that will make your experience even better than before!

We’ve integrated in-app messaging to help you find features you might not have noticed before, along with educational information to help you get the most out of our app. You’ll also find it easier to review our app and give us feedback, so we can continue improving your experience. As always, we’ve also resolved some minor bugs in order to give you a more seamless experience.

In this latest update, we've made many improvements to accessibility.

As always, we've also resolved a handful of reported bugs relating to placing calls and utilizing some of our call features.
We've resolved a number of reported bugs that should greatly improve your experience! We've also made some minor updates to Accessibility.

We've upgraded SpoofCard to ensure more stability for our users. We appreciate all of the feedback we received and we think you'll be very happy with this latest update. Please don't hesitate to email us your feedback so we can continue to improve! Our users are the most important thing to us and we want to make sure you are all enjoying this app. Thank you!
Highly recommended update! In this latest update, we've resolved the reported crashes. Thank you to our community for reporting these so we could fix them quickly for you.

As promised, we're working hard to make regular updates to ensure the best experience for you, our awesome community. Thank you for your reviews and feedback - we value it so much and will continue updating our application based on your feedback.

In this update, we've also resolved the issue reported where our application was freezing. You should see a much better experience in this latest version.
Highly recommended update! In this latest update, we've resolved the reported crashes. Thank you to our community for reporting these so we could fix them quickly for you.

MAJOR UPDATE!

Now offering in-app purchasing! We've also updated our app to be fully compatible with iOS 13.

Download and sign up today. All new customers will receive free credits just for signing up!
As part of our commitment to releasing consistent updates, this update comes with an improved user experience and minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes
In keeping with our bi-weekly releases, here's our new and improved update! We're committed to delivering a high-quality experience and thank you for your continued feedback and support.

* Updated to be fully iOS13 compatible for speed and optimization
* Bug fixes and UI adjustments for a better user experience

* Additional updates for iOS13
* Bug fixes

Highly recommended update! As always, we strive to deliver an excellent experience. In this new version you'll find:

* International calling is now easier than ever before
* Access numbers have been updated for your convenience
* Additional bug fixes to ensure a great experience

If you ever have any problems, our support team is readily accessible through our Live Chat option in the app.

Ahoy Spoofmates! Captain SpoofCard here!
Shiver me timbers, have we got some exciting news for you. Apologies for the pirate puns. We've got a major update heading your way!

* We've integrated better support into SpoofCard. This means if you can't click a button or if you run into an issue, the app will communicate what's wrong through an in-app message.
* Area code fixes - Calling to Washington D.C. & Washington State is available again. We now also support calling to more countries and local area codes than ever before!
* Light updates to the look of our app, to make it even easier to use.
* We improved our infrastructure. It may sound boring but honestly, it scales way better than before. And engineering says that's a good thing.

Ahoy Spoofmates! Captain SpoofCard here!
Shiver me timbers, have we got some exciting news for you. Apologies for the pirate puns. We've got a major update heading your way!

* We've integrated better support into SpoofCard. This means if you can't click a button or if you run into an issue, the app will communicate what's wrong through an in-app message.
* Area code fixes - Calling to Washington D.C. & Washington State is available again. We now also support calling to more countries and local area codes than ever before!
* Light updates to the look of our app, to make it even easier to use.
* We improved our infrastructure. It may sound boring but honestly, it scales way better than before. And engineering says that's a good thing.
Highly recommended update! This latest version resolves a crash that was reported by users who were on outdated versions of the app. Once you update, this issue should be resolved.

Hey SpoofCard community! We've updated a bunch of things to make SpoofCard even better, thanks to your feedback.

* Overhauled international calling support
* Added Sign In With Apple
* Improved app stability for users still on iOS12
* Fixed reported crashes and improved performance

As always, don't hesitate to contact us should you need assistance or have any questions. We're happy to help!

**NEW UPDATE**

- BRAND NEW background noise
- Updated permissions so you're only prompted when necessary
- Updated push notification experience
- Updated flag icons for a visible indicator of the country you're calling
- Updated WiFi calling
- General bug fixes

**NEW UPDATE**

- BRAND NEW background noise
- Resolved a bug that existed when signing up with Apple or Facebook
- Updated permissions so you're only prompted when necessary
- Updated push notification experience
- Updated flag icons for a visible indicator of the country you're calling
- Updated WiFi calling
- General bug fixes

**New Update**

Highly recommended update! This version contains:
- Easier access to special promotions through in-app purchases
- In-app messaging for version updates
- Minor bug fixes

New update includes:
- Easily accessible version number, so you always know if you're on the latest version
- Updates to our in-app purchasing. Stay tuned for exciting in-app flash sales!
- Minor bug fixes

In this update we:

- Updated in-app notifications
- Resolved "Error 503" that some users received when their cellular network was turned off
- Updated our access numbers
- Made additional fixes to a number of reported bugs
Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

Tons of updates have arrived in our latest version!

- Updated dialer with native iOS keyboard - this will make placing calls much easier
- Numerous adjustments to the main call screen
- Updated Accessibility labels for the main call screen
- Updated error messaging
- Numerous bug reports and crashes resolved
- Lots of housekeeping to remove old code and increase app stability and speed

Highly recommended update, especially for customers who have been using older versions of the app.
Minor bug fixes that were affecting users on older iOS versions.
